abstract: On Tuesday, Chancellor William B. Chandler III dismissed all but one of the claims in a shareholder suit in the Delaware Chancery Court against the board of Citigroup. The shareholders principally alleged that the Citi board had breached their fiduciary duties by allowing the company to invest in, and sustain significant losses in, the subprime lending market.
lead_paragraph: On Tuesday, Chancellor William B. Chandler III dismissed all but one of the claims in a shareholder suit in the Delaware Chancery Court against the board of Citigroup. The shareholders principally alleged that the Citi board had breached their fiduciary duties by allowing the company to invest in, and sustain significant losses in, the subprime lending market.

headline.main: Big Win in Delaware for Corporate Boards
